name: Pyramid Rob
description:
Your goal is to collect all the coins on each level. Your job is made difficult by the many traps and enemies.

There are 30 levels(+1 endless), 5 types of enemies, a boss and a variety of traps.

There is 5 characters with different abilities.

Personal:

This is my first game that I made in my life last year at the age of 16, this game was made only to learn Unity and game development, I did not intend to publish it. But for now I think I'll share this simple game in case someone has fun with it.

The game is playable, but you may encounter some kind of bugs. If you find a bug that is critical to the game experience, please let me know in comment.
